eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
R_{00} &=& - \sum_{\alpha=1}^p [ \ddot u_\alpha + (\dot u_\alpha)^2 -\dot u_\alpha \dot u_0]
- k(\ddot B + \dot B^2 - \dot B \dot u_0 ), \nonumber\\
R_{\alpha\beta} &=& e^{2(u_\alpha-u_0)} [\ddot u_\alpha -\dot u_\alpha \dot u_0
+ \sum_{\gamma=1}^p \dot u_\gamma \dot u_\alpha + k \dot B \dot u_\alpha]\delta_{\alpha\beta}, \nonumber\\
R_{ab} &=& \Big\{ e^{2(B-u_0)}[\ddot B + k \dot B^2 -\dot B \dot u_0
+ \sum_{\alpha=1}^p \dot u_\alpha \dot B] + \sigma (k-1)\Big\}\bar g_{ab},
\label{ricci}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
B = g - \frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p u_\alpha, \qquad
u_0 = kg - \frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p u_\alpha,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&& (k-1) \left( \sum_{A} \frac{q_A+1}{2(d-2)} c_A E_A
- \frac{1}{k-1}\sum_{\alpha=1}^p c_\alpha\right)^2
+ \sum_{\alpha=1}^p \left( \sum_{A} \frac{\delta_{A}^{(\alpha)}}{2(d-2)} c_A E_A
- c_\alpha \right)^2 \nonumber\\
&& + \; \frac{1}{2} \left( \sum_{A} \frac{\epsilon_A a_A}{2} c_A E_A + c_\phi \right)^2
+ \sum_{A} \frac{c_A}{2} \dot E_A - k(k-1) \beta^2 =0.
\label{sint}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
u_0 &=& kg(t) + \sum_{A} \frac{q_A+1}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(t-t_A)
+c_0 t + c_0', \nonumber\\
u_\alpha &=& - \sum_{A} \frac{\delta_{A}^{(\alpha)}}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(t-t_A)
+ \tilde c_\alpha t + c_\alpha', \nonumber\\
B &=& g(t) + \sum_{A} \frac{q_A+1}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(t-t_A)
+ c_0 t +c_0', \nonumber\\
\phi &=& \sum_{A} \frac{(d-2)\epsilon_A a_A}{\Delta_A} \ln \cosh\tilde c_A(t-t_A)
+\tilde c_\phi t + c_\phi',
\label{res3}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
ds_d^2 &=& \prod_A [\cosh\tilde c_A (t-t_A)]^{2 \frac{q_A+1}{\Delta_A}}
\Bigg[ e^{2kg(t)+2c_0 t+2c_0'} \left\{ - dt^2
+ e^{-2(k-1)g(t)}d\Sigma_{k,\sigma}^2\right\} \nonumber\\
&& \hspace{20 mm} +\; \sum_{\alpha=1}^{p} \prod_A [\cosh\tilde c_A(t-t_A)]^{- 2
\frac{\gamma_A^{(\alpha)}}{\Delta_A}} e^{2 \tilde c_\alpha t+2c_\alpha'} dy_\alpha^2\Bigg], \nonumber\\
E_A &=& \frac{e^{\tilde c_A(t-t_A)}}{N_A \cosh \tilde c_A(t-t_A)},\quad
\tilde c_A = \sum_{\alpha\in q_A} c_\alpha-\frac{1}{2} c_\phi \epsilon_A a_A.
\

\begin{eqnarray}
R_{00} &=& - \sum_{\alpha=1}^p [ \ddot u_\alpha + (\dot u_\alpha)^2 -\dot u_\alpha \dot u_0]
- k(\ddot B + \dot B^2 - \dot B \dot u_0 ), \nonumber\\
R_{\alpha\beta} &=& e^{2(u_\alpha-u_0)} [\ddot u_\alpha -\dot u_\alpha \dot u_0
+ \sum_{\gamma=1}^p \dot u_\gamma \dot u_\alpha + k \dot B \dot u_\alpha]\delta_{\alpha\beta}, \nonumber\\
R_{ab} &=& \Big\{ e^{2(B-u_0)}[\ddot B + k \dot B^2 -\dot B \dot u_0
+ \sum_{\alpha=1}^p \dot u_\alpha \dot B] + \sigma (k-1)\Big\}\bar g_{ab},

\

+ \sum_{A} \frac{c_A}{2} \dot E_A - k(k-1) \beta^2 =0.
